korean: 퇴근길에 사고가 나서 도로가 완전히 막혔다.
한 시간 동안 거의 움직이지 못했어.
라디오 듣고 노래 부르며 시간을 때웠다.
집에 도착하니까 평소보다 두 배나 걸렸다.
english: There was an accident on the way home from work, so the road was completely blocked.
I barely moved for an hour.
I killed time by listening to the radio and singing along.
It took twice as long as usual to get home.
